verses.verse: <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> the <S%H4194>death<s%> of the <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H175>Aaron,<s%> when they <S%H7126>drew<s%> near <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> and <S%H4191>died;<s%>

and <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H1696>"Tell<s%> <S%H175>Aaron<s%> your <S%H251>brother,<s%> not to <S%H935>come<s%> at all <S%H6256>times<s%> into the Most <S%H6944>Holy<s%> Place <S%H1004>within<s%> the <S%H6532>veil,<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the mercy <S%H3727>seat<s%> which is on the <S%H727>ark;<s%> lest he <S%H4191>die:<s%> for I will <S%H7200>appear<s%> in the <S%H6051>cloud<s%> on the mercy <S%H3727>seat.<s%>

<S%H2063>"Herewith<s%> shall <S%H175>Aaron<s%> <S%H935>come<s%> into the <S%H6944>sanctuary:<s%> with a <S%H1121>young<s%> <S%H6499>bull<s%> for a sin <S%H2403>offering,<s%> and a <S%H352>ram<s%> for a burnt <S%H2403>offering.<s%>

He shall put <S%H3847>on<s%> the <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H906>linen<s%> <S%H3801>coat,<s%> and he shall have the <S%H906>linen<s%> <S%H4370>breeches<s%> on his <S%H1320>body,<s%> and shall put <S%H2296>on<s%> the <S%H906>linen<s%> <S%H73>sash,<s%> and he shall be <S%H6801>clothed<s%> with the <S%H906>linen<s%> <S%H4701>turban.<s%> <S%H1992>They<s%> are the <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H899>garments.<s%> He shall <S%H7364>bathe<s%> his <S%H1320>body<s%> in <S%H4325>water,<s%> and put them <S%H3847>on.<s%>

He shall <S%H3947>take<s%> from the <S%H5712>congregation<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H8163>male<s%> <S%H5795>goats<s%> for a sin <S%H2403>offering,<s%> and <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H352>ram<s%> for a burnt <S%H2403>offering.<s%>

<S%H175>"Aaron<s%> shall <S%H7126>offer<s%> the <S%H6499>bull<s%> of the sin <S%H2403>offering,<s%> which is for <S%H1157>himself,<s%> and make <S%H3722>atonement<s%> for himself and for his <S%H1004>house.<s%>

He shall <S%H3947>take<s%> the <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H8163>goats,<s%> and <S%H5975>set<s%> them <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> at the <S%H6607>door<s%> of the <S%H168>Tent<s%> of <S%H4150>Meeting.<s%>

<S%H175>Aaron<s%> shall <S%H5414>cast<s%> <S%H1486>lots<s%> for the <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H8163>goats;<s%> <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H1486>lot<s%> for <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> and the <S%H259>other<s%> <S%H1486>lot<s%> for the <S%H5799>scapegoat.<s%>
<S%H175>Aaron<s%> shall <S%H7126>present<s%> the <S%H8163>goat<s%> on which the <S%H1486>lot<s%> <S%H5927>fell<s%> for <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> and <S%H6213>offer<s%> him for a sin <S%H2403>offering.<s%>

But the <S%H8163>goat,<s%> on which the <S%H1486>lot<s%> <S%H5927>fell<s%> for the <S%H5799>scapegoat,<s%> shall be <S%H5975>presented<s%> <S%H2416>alive<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> to make <S%H3722>atonement<s%> for <S%H7971>him,<s%> to send him away for the <S%H5799>scapegoat<s%> into the <S%H4057>wilderness.<s%>

<S%H175>"Aaron<s%> shall <S%H7126>present<s%> the <S%H6499>bull<s%> of the sin <S%H2403>offering,<s%> which is for <S%H3722>himself,<s%> and shall make atonement for himself and for his <S%H1004>house,<s%> and shall <S%H7819>kill<s%> the <S%H6499>bull<s%> of the sin offering which is for <S%H2403>himself.<s%>

He shall <S%H3947>take<s%> a <S%H4289>censer<s%> <S%H4393>full<s%> <S%H784>of<s%> <S%H1513>coals<s%> of <S%H784>fire<s%> from off the <S%H4196>altar<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> and <S%H2651>two<s%> <S%H4393>handfuls<s%> of <S%H5561>sweet<s%> <S%H7004>incense<s%> beaten <S%H1851>small,<s%> and <S%H935>bring<s%> it <S%H1004>within<s%> the <S%H6532>veil:<s%>

and he shall <S%H5414>put<s%> the <S%H7004>incense<s%> on the <S%H784>fire<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> that the <S%H6051>cloud<s%> of the <S%H7004>incense<s%> may <S%H3680>cover<s%> the mercy <S%H3727>seat<s%> that is on the <S%H5715>testimony,<s%> so that he will not <S%H4191>die.<s%>

He shall <S%H3947>take<s%> some of the <S%H1818>blood<s%> of the <S%H6499>bull,<s%> and <S%H5137>sprinkle<s%> it with his <S%H676>finger<s%> on the mercy <S%H3727>seat<s%> on the <S%H6924>east;<s%> and <S%H6440>before<s%> the mercy <S%H3727>seat<s%> he shall <S%H5137>sprinkle<s%> some of the <S%H1818>blood<s%> with his <S%H676>finger<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H6471>times.<s%>

"Then he shall <S%H7819>kill<s%> the <S%H8163>goat<s%> of the sin <S%H2403>offering,<s%> that is for the <S%H5971>people,<s%> and <S%H935>bring<s%> his <S%H1818>blood<s%> <S%H1004>within<s%> the <S%H6532>veil,<s%> and <S%H6213>do<s%> with his <S%H1818>blood<s%> as he <S%H6213>did<s%> with the <S%H1818>blood<s%> of the <S%H6499>bull,<s%> and <S%H5137>sprinkle<s%> it on the mercy <S%H3727>seat,<s%> and <S%H6440>before<s%> the mercy <S%H3727>seat:<s%>

and he shall make <S%H3722>atonement<s%> for the <S%H6944>Holy<s%> <S%H2932>Place,<s%> because of the uncleanness of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> and because of their <S%H6588>transgressions,<s%> even all their <S%H2403>sins;<s%> and so he shall <S%H6213>do<s%> for the <S%H168>Tent<s%> of <S%H4150>Meeting,<s%> that <S%H7931>dwells<s%> with them in the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of their <S%H2932>uncleanness.<s%>

No <S%H120>one<s%> shall be in the <S%H168>Tent<s%> of <S%H4150>Meeting<s%> when he <S%H935>enters<s%> to make <S%H3722>atonement<s%> in the <S%H6944>Holy<s%> <S%H3318>Place,<s%> until he comes out, and has made <S%H3722>atonement<s%> for himself and for his <S%H1004>household,<s%> and for all the <S%H6951>assembly<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

"He shall go <S%H3318>out<s%> to the <S%H4196>altar<s%> that is <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> and make <S%H3722>atonement<s%> for <S%H3947>it,<s%> and shall take some of the <S%H6499>bull<s%>'s <S%H1818>blood,<s%> and some of the <S%H8163>goat<s%>'s <S%H1818>blood,<s%> and <S%H5414>put<s%> it <S%H5439>around<s%> on the <S%H7161>horns<s%> of the <S%H4196>altar.<s%>

He shall <S%H5137>sprinkle<s%> some of the <S%H1818>blood<s%> on it with his <S%H676>finger<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H6471>times,<s%> and <S%H2891>cleanse<s%> <S%H6942>it,<s%> and make it holy from the <S%H2932>uncleanness<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

"When he has made an <S%H3615>end<s%> of <S%H3722>atoning<s%> for the <S%H6944>Holy<s%> <S%H168>Place,<s%> the Tent of <S%H4150>Meeting,<s%> and the <S%H4196>altar,<s%> he shall <S%H7126>present<s%> the <S%H2416>live<s%> <S%H8163>goat.<s%>

<S%H175>Aaron<s%> shall <S%H5564>lay<s%> <S%H8147>both<s%> his <S%H3027>hands<s%> on the <S%H7218>head<s%> of the <S%H2416>live<s%> <S%H8163>goat,<s%> and <S%H3034>confess<s%> over him all the <S%H5771>iniquities<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> and all their <S%H6588>transgressions,<s%> even all their <S%H2403>sins;<s%> and he shall <S%H5414>put<s%> them on the <S%H7218>head<s%> of the <S%H8163>goat,<s%> and shall send him <S%H7971>away<s%> into the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%> by the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of a <S%H376>man<s%> who is in <S%H6261>readiness.<s%>

The <S%H8163>goat<s%> shall <S%H5375>carry<s%> all their <S%H5771>iniquities<s%> on himself to a <S%H1509>solitary<s%> <S%H776>land,<s%> and he shall let the <S%H8163>goat<s%> <S%H7971>go<s%> in the <S%H4057>wilderness.<s%>

<S%H175>"Aaron<s%> shall <S%H935>come<s%> into the <S%H168>Tent<s%> of <S%H4150>Meeting,<s%> and shall take <S%H6584>off<s%> the <S%H906>linen<s%> <S%H899>garments,<s%> which he put <S%H3847>on<s%> when he <S%H935>went<s%> into the <S%H6944>Holy<s%> <S%H3240>Place,<s%> and shall leave them there.

Then he shall <S%H7364>bathe<s%> <S%H1320>himself<s%> in <S%H4325>water<s%> in a <S%H6918>holy<s%> <S%H4725>place,<s%> and put <S%H3847>on<s%> his <S%H899>garments,<s%> and come <S%H3318>out<s%> and <S%H6213>offer<s%> his burnt <S%H5930>offering<s%> and the burnt <S%H5930>offering<s%> of the <S%H5971>people,<s%> and make <S%H3722>atonement<s%> for himself and for the <S%H5971>people.<s%>
The <S%H2459>fat<s%> of the sin <S%H2403>offering<s%> he shall <S%H6999>burn<s%> on the <S%H4196>altar.<s%>

"He who lets the <S%H8163>goat<s%> <S%H7971>go<s%> for the <S%H5799>scapegoat<s%> shall <S%H3526>wash<s%> his <S%H899>clothes,<s%> and <S%H3526>bathe<s%> his <S%H1320>flesh<s%> in <S%H4325>water,<s%> and <S%H310>afterward<s%> he shall <S%H935>come<s%> into the <S%H4264>camp.<s%>

The <S%H6499>bull<s%> for the sin <S%H2403>offering,<s%> and the <S%H8163>goat<s%> for the sin <S%H2403>offering,<s%> whose <S%H1818>blood<s%> was brought <S%H935>in<s%> to make <S%H3722>atonement<s%> in the <S%H6944>Holy<s%> <S%H3318>Place,<s%> shall be carried forth <S%H2351>outside<s%> the <S%H4264>camp;<s%> and they shall <S%H8313>burn<s%> their <S%H5785>skins,<s%> their <S%H1320>flesh,<s%> and their <S%H6569>dung<s%> with <S%H784>fire.<s%>

He who <S%H8313>burns<s%> them shall <S%H3526>wash<s%> his <S%H899>clothes,<s%> and <S%H3526>bathe<s%> his <S%H1320>flesh<s%> in <S%H4325>water,<s%> and <S%H310>afterward<s%> he shall <S%H935>come<s%> into the <S%H4264>camp.<s%>

"It shall be a <S%H2708>statute<s%> to you <S%H5769>forever:<s%> in the <S%H7637>seventh<s%> <S%H2320>month,<s%> on the <S%H6218>tenth<s%> day of the <S%H2320>month,<s%> you shall <S%H6031>afflict<s%> your <S%H5315>souls,<s%> and shall <S%H6213>do<s%> no kind of <S%H4399>work,<s%> the <S%H249>native-born,<s%> or the <S%H1616>stranger<s%> who lives as a <S%H1481>foreigner<s%> among <S%H8432>you:<s%>

for on this <S%H3117>day<s%> shall <S%H3722>atonement<s%> be made for <S%H2891>you,<s%> to cleanse <S%H2403>you;<s%> from all your sins you shall be <S%H2891>clean<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>
It is a <S%H7676>Sabbath<s%> of solemn <S%H7677>rest<s%> to <S%H6031>you,<s%> and you shall afflict your <S%H5315>souls;<s%> it is a <S%H2708>statute<s%> <S%H5769>forever.<s%>

The <S%H3548>priest,<s%> who is <S%H4886>anointed<s%> and who is <S%H4390>consecrated<s%> to be <S%H3547>priest<s%> in his <S%H1>father<s%>'s <S%H3722>place,<s%> shall make the atonement, and shall put <S%H3847>on<s%> the <S%H906>linen<s%> <S%H899>garments,<s%> even the <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H899>garments.<s%>

Then he shall make <S%H3722>atonement<s%> for the <S%H6944>Holy<s%> <S%H4720>Sanctuary;<s%> and he shall make <S%H3722>atonement<s%> for the <S%H168>Tent<s%> of <S%H4150>Meeting<s%> and for the <S%H4196>altar;<s%> and he shall make <S%H3722>atonement<s%> for the <S%H3548>priests<s%> and for all the <S%H5971>people<s%> of the <S%H6951>assembly.<s%>

"This shall be an <S%H5769>everlasting<s%> <S%H2708>statute<s%> for <S%H3722>you,<s%> to make atonement for the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H259>once<s%> in the <S%H8141>year<s%> because of all their <S%H2403>sins.<s%>" It was <S%H6213>done<s%> as <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H4872>Moses.<s%>
